title: Satisfy your sweet tooth with Sugar Rush!

replies.body: R.I.P My wallet
You still own your wallet? I sold mine to Riot a long time ago.
Sounds like my house will go to Riot ...
Mine was sold to Janna's $2.95/minute services.
I'd give my first born for Rusty Blitzcrank

Guy below me who wants Rusty Blitzcrank-

don't give away your kid please.

Turn down your brightness on normal Blitzcrank.

TA DA!

Now give me your firstborn for telling you this.
You still have your house? I lost that during season 2.
I've been living in a cardboard box in an internet cafe for the past 3 seasons.
the steam summer sale took mine...
I shall now cry because I am poor. And that is why I must get a good paying job. And life. And a legendary skin while I'm at it.
My money belongs to everyone but me XD
yay but cant afford any of it. #thatkidlifetho
Yay! Can't afford any of it! #thatcollegelifedoh
Yay! Can't afford any of it! #thatdoglifetho
Yay!! but i cant afford any of it. #exwifeiswhoredoe
yay but cant afford any of it. #thatmarriedlifetho
Yay but cant afford it. #thatgrandkidslifedoe
Yay! but cant afford it. #thatjoblesslifedoe
SWEET!
You might have rushed that pun, but I'm satisfied.
I guess Phreak has a sweet spot for puns.
PUNS OF DAMAGE
I See's what you did there
Sorry...it was just mint to be
Calm down Phreak.
Well this is unexpected... Was saving for a PS4, but looks like i'm gonna have to get 400$ worth of RP instead.

>Was saving for a PS4

Well, there's your first peasant problem.
#PCMasterRace
Is it bad that im upvoting this on a Mac?...

**Only 260 Gold?**



{{champion:99}} Ezreal! Nidalee! Look over here, they've got a bunch of old outfits on sale!

{{champion:81}} Heh, cool. Kind of like the green one.

{{champion:76}} I think this leopard print is pretty.

{{champion:99}} Hm. Nothing in my size.

{{champion:99}} Oh, well. How should we get the money to pay for these?

{{champion:81}} I just finished some maps the other day. I'm set.

{{champion:76}} ...

{{champion:99}} What's wrong, Nid?

{{champion:76}} What is 'pay'?

{{champion:81}} Never mind, I'll help you get this today, buy you'll have to get 260 gold for me later. 

{{champion:81}} Just whenever you can.

{{champion:99}} Nid, I saw some of the other champions leave this shop a little while ago.

{{champion:99}} Perhaps one of them has a way you can earn gold.



**-SOME TIME LATER-**



{{champion:17}} Okay, I'll distract them by pretending to be a badger, then you distract them by being a cat.

{{champion:17}} Then they step on a mushroom, then I shoot them and you eat them or something, then we take all their money and stuff.

{{champion:76}} I don't like this plan.

{{champion:17}} *munches shroom*

{{champion:76}} Teemo?

{{champion:17}} REFRIGERATOR HERNIA!



**-EVEN LATER-**



{{champion:15}} Well, you could help me with a bounty. It's not much, but it should be enough for you.

{{champion:76}} What would we be doing?

{{champion:15}} Apparently, a rabid mutant badger is attacking travelers along a road sou-

{{champion:15}} Nidalee?

{{champion:15}} Where'd you go?



**-MUCH LATER-**



{{champion:4}} Nidalee, this trick will be super easy.

{{champion:4}} All you have to do is turn into a cat when I wave my hand like *this*.

{{champion:76}} Okay, I can do that.

{{champion:4}} Then I'll cut you in half!

{{champion:76}} !!!



**-HOURS LATER-**



{{champion:36}} You help Mundo promote new gym?

{{champion:78}} Give me a hand forging these swords?

{{champion:98}} Enter a tournament with me?

{{champion:90}} Discretely deliver several missives of great import for me?

{{champion:74}} Kidnap sleeping people for science?

{{champion:18}} Help me put out fires?

{{champion:44}} Fabulous *gems*!

{{champion:10}} HELP ME FIND MY HELMET!

{{champion:41}} Sail the vast oceans of the world as me deckhand?

{{champion:6}} Gimmie a hand cutting this meat. Um. Better gimmie two.

{{champion:51}} Assist me on a grand safari?

{{champion:32}} Swear yourself to my eternal service as a thrall to the pharaoh?



**-SEVERAL HOURS LATER-**



{{champion:76}} *sob*

{{champion:62}} Nidalee? What is the matter?

{{champion:76}} [RECAP]

{{champion:62}} Haha, you just need gold?

{{champion:62}} Take this, I don't need it.

{{champion:76}} Thank you, Wukong. You are a good friend!

{{champion:62}} Ah, it's no-

{{champion:17}} Hands in air! I'm a fruity BADGER!

{{champion:76}} Oh, no.

{{champion:17}} Give ALL YOUR MONEY!

{{champion:17}} Whoah.

{{champion:17}} YOU'RE ALL CATS!



**-THE NEXT DAY-**



{{champion:81}} Will Wukong be okay?

{{champion:76}} In a week, perhaps.

{{champion:99}} Did they ever catch Teemo?

{{champion:76}} No, and I still have no gold.

{{champion:81}} Hey, don't worry about it. No big deal really.

{{champion:76}} This has all been such trouble.

{{champion:81}} Hey, could have been a *lot* worse.



**-MEANWHILE-**



{{champion:42}} Give me back my plane!

{{champion:17}} UP LIKE BRIGHTLY DRAGON MARTINI!

{{champion:17}} *flies colorfully into the horizon*




**THE END?**

***Somewhere not far from Demacia***

{{champion:102}} You need to polish up that armor.

{{champion:82}}  It's fine the way it is.

{{champion:102}} If you join Demacia, I could get you some shiny new armor for working with me.

{{champion:82}} No thanks.

{{champion:102}} Are you sure? It's a nice shiny red.

{{champion:82}} My armor is normally stained red with the blood of enemy minions.

{{champion:102}} Riiiiight... But since I know Jarvan--

{{champion:82}} You mean the mortal with the set of Dragonslayer armor?

{{champion:102}} Odd right?  But it means a new cape.

{{champion:82}}Hm, I could use a new cape.....

***Later....***

{{champion:102}} Sir, I've brought you a new...uh, recruit.

{{champion:59}} Excellent news!  Though have you seen...

***-Suddenly, a tumbleweed appears-***

{{champion:86}} *DEMACIAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!*

{{champion:59}} Good heavens, man!  How many times have I 
said not to do that indoors?

{{champion:86}} Sorry sir, just testing my new technique for the upcoming desert campaign.  There can't always be a nearby bush after all.

{{champion:59}}{{champion:102}} *Riiiight.*

{{champion:82}} So, about that cape, mortals.

{{champion:102}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:102}} **Stares quietly**

{{champion:82}} Uh....Demacia?

{{champion:26}}Well, that was a head rush.

{{champion:74}}Look who is talking...

{{champion:26}}I could go back in time and remove the afro hair style and erase your dad from existence.

{{champion:74}} Well, the dad part, I don't care about. BUT THE AFRO, THATS A DIFFERENT STORY!

{{champion:26}}Oh, ok so I can go kill your dad?

{{champion:74}} Remember, if you can't helium, or curium, you barium...
That was...beautiful{{item:3070}}

Is there a purpose for this?

NOT AT ALL!

This is why I love Riot. They just do shit like this for absolutely no reason other than loving the community <3
You understand what money is right?
Not since it was taken from me by Riot back 2010, seems like a long forgotten memory . . .
Does this mean Baker Pantheon is coming soon?
Let me guess...a giant cookie shield? xD
Let me guess ... someone stole Pantheon's sweet roll shield again?
Report Mundo for being toxic
Brb, selling my first born.

Of all the times in August, you decided to do it on the last week? The same one when school/college starts?

Thinking OP
Pay for Tuition or buy Rp? {{summoner:13}}

Step 1: Pay for tuition
Step 2: Get a good job
Step 3: ?????
Step 4: Use all the your money on riot skins (aka profit!)

Does the Canadian currency still give less RP during this event?
What other companies does this to their customers?
Canadian Dollars are worth less than US Dollars, so practically everyone treats them as less.
Im supposed so save my college money.... Pleas Riot have mercy... {{item:3070}}
In all honesty riot: the Lulu picture terrified me and I left the page before I got more scared
Hi, can anyone answer why Kitty Cat Katarina isn't on the sales list for the legacy skins? It's my dream skin. Thanks :(
Because Kitty Kat Katarina is a Harrowing Legacy skin. These are just plain ol Legacy skins that come available when the Vault opens.
